casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Zachary BLANKENSHIP 131P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2018 Mark Montgomery, Attorney at Law, for Blankenship, Zachary Allen.

Tracy Nayer, Assistant Attorney General.

Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of May 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2018."
